attributes.action: save Lostock College and to say NO to the proposed Academy merging Lostock College with Stretford High.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SAVE OUR SCHOOL. There are plans to combine Lostock College with Stretford High School to create an Academy. We want to protect our children's education by retaining Lostock College as a school in it's own right.  Education is the most critical part of a childs life and any disruption can have devastating affects both in the present and their future. So we say NO Academy and Yes to saving Lostock College!!
